channel.title: Hacking server
channel.description:
Lol ya its not rly hacking but handy.
How do i make it so if i go on my owner-only-client (me only uses, just for my OWN server) so it shows above the hp bar (in pking) the **/** prayer of my opponoment and if its possible to show if he clicked on the special bar or not. But the prayer thingy is more important. And just for myself. Other people with normal clients won't see it.

item.title: Hacking server
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“jarnohhh, post:1, topic:300484”]Lol ya its not rly hacking but handy.

How do i make it so if i go on my owner-only-client (me only uses, just for my OWN server) so it shows above the hp bar (in pking) the / prayer of my opponoment and if its possible to show if he clicked on the special bar or not. But the prayer thingy is more important. And just for myself. Other people with normal clients won’t see it.[/quote]
If this is all on your client already, add a uid to your server so they get kicked when using another client

Read full topic
